thread.title: University of Pennsylvania to Remove Steve Wynn’s Name From Commons, Revoke Honorary Degree

author: Melissa Korn
title: University of Pennsylvania to Remove Steve Wynn’s Name From Commons, Revoke Honorary Degree
text:
The University of Pennsylvania is stripping casino magnate Steve Wynn’s name from a campus plaza and revoking an honorary degree he received in 2006, amid sexual-misconduct allegations reported by The Wall Street Journal. 
Mr. Wynn’s name will be removed from Wynn Commons, an outdoor plaza on campus with a prominent sign carrying his name. A Penn graduate and former trustee, Mr. Wynn had donated $7.5 million toward the construction of a quadrangle on campus.
